DOC.brief_summary: The aim study : Assessment Changes Periocular Skin Sensation Following Eyelid Ocular Surface Surgeries . Study design : interventional study conduct ophthalmology department , Meir hospital , Kfar Saba , Israel . study include 60 healthy patient , age 40-80 , candidate eyelid surgery : blepharoptosis repair , blepharoplasty , ectropion repair entropion repair . The patient recruit Meir 's ophthalmology outpatient clinic . Each patient undergo full ophthalmologic examination include relevant assessment specific eyelid pathology . The eyelid 's sensation assess 6 point eyelid use Cochet-Bonnet filament-type aesthesiometer ( Luneau Ophtalmologie , Paris , France ) . Measurements take place surgery , two week , three month six month surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Changes Periocular Skin Sensation Following Eyelid Ocular Surface Surgeries
DOC.criteria: Ability give consent Eyelid pathology : blepharoptosis , blepharochalasis , ectropion entropion , additional eyelid pathology Children pregnant woman Previous eyelid surgery A systemic disease influence eyelid position Any neurologic disease Previous facial herpetic infection
